text: in this demo we will cover how to view
and search contact records via date
range and agent ID
once you have logged into the Amazon
connect instance you will be redirected
to the home page
to view the recorded conversations hover
over the analytics and optimization icon
under contact lens click on contact
search
this can be useful in scenarios such as
a customer recently calling in regards
to their conversation between December
22nd and December 23 2022 regarding the
banking status for their home loan
do this and the filters select time
range and select December 22nd 2022 as a
start date in December 23rd as the end
date
we can also refine the search by start
and end time additionally we can filter
by the channel this specifies whether we
want to filter the search by voice chat
or task
we can also filter the search by the
agent ID
this is useful if we are a core manager
and we want to view the recorded
conversation after the agent has closed
the contact
we can do this by clicking click here to
add filter and selecting agent
we can search for the agent ID by their
login first or last name
or we can select the desired agent by
the select box
let's search by the agent ID for example
agent 1.
we can see that there are also other
filters here such as contact ID and
queue if we need to refine our search
after selecting agent 1 we can now see
the list of contacts for this agent
each conversation that is recorded will
have a recording or transcript column
this is useful for tracing back on
conversations
by being able to search through
conversations we are able to effectively
view the desired conversations
empowering us to better train and enable
our call center staff to assist
customers
thank you for joining me to learn how to
view and search contact records
